name: Wild Lion Simulator Attack 3D
description:
Being the king of the jungle and pride of wildlife, the lion is a ferocious animal in the wild. To live like a lion king is always a dream.
Now this dream comes to true as you can play Wild Hungry Lion Simulator. Hunt as a lion for food and look out for the innocent animals as your prey.

Join in the wild safari hunting to enjoy the best animal simulator. The roar of a lion is the symbol of pride, bravery, and fear in any jungle.

Become a part of this pride and feel the sensation to be the king of the jungle. The animal who is above all of the food chains, hunting all animals of the jungle to survive.

In the game, there is a beautiful jungle with greenery and gross in the spring season.
There are different kinds of wild animals including Zebras, Deer, and farm animals like Goats, Sheep, and cows in the jungle roaming and grazing around. And, the other side of the Jungle behind the mountains there are lion roaring and looking for their prey.

When the animals come in the sight of Lions, the Lion run towards the nearest wild animals to catch and kill to eat.

Feature:
• Actual thrill of chasing down animals.
• Beautiful jungle environment.
• Dominate the jungle world.
• Realistic lion controls and animations.
• Multiple animals to fight including lions, bears, wolf, rhino, and hippo.
• Amazing graphics with cool background music.
• Fast and addictive lion simulator gameplay.

Take control of a Lion, fight for your life against fierce animals like elephants, rhino and hippo, and dominate the wild world.
